channel.title: How To Join?
channel.description:
Okay.. I got my own server. THERE IS ALL WHAT I HAVE BEEN USED 1st. I download server beta 2nd. I download 508 ip changer 3rd. I change run.bat and compile and everything else to my java version. I GOT JDK1.6.0_13 4th. I run my run.bat and and it says something: Starting server on port: 43594 5th. I go on server on my hamachi IP: 5.169.157.112 I get in. Okay here comes the problem: Now when i go to mine other computer and try to join my server with 508 ip changer It only say: CONNECTION TO UPDATE SERVER :eek:
HOW I FIX THIS PROBLEM!! :confused: I WANNA SO MY OWN SERVER :( THX IF YOU HELP ME :rolleyes: IS IT BOSSIBLE TO IT DOSN´T CONNECT COZ I USE SAME NETWORK?

item.title: How To Join?

item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“Coca-Cola-Zero, post:1, topic:282284”]Okay… I got my own server.
THERE IS ALL WHAT I HAVE BEEN USED
1st. I download server beta
2nd. I download 508 ip changer
3rd. I change run.bat and compila and everything else to my java version. I GOT JDK1.6.0_13
4th. I run my run.bat and and it says something: Starting server on port: 43594
5th. I go on server on my hamachi IP: 5.169.157.112 I get in.
Okay here comes the problem: Now when i go to mine other computer and try to join my server with 508 ip changer It only say: CONNECTION TO UPDATE SERVER :eek:

HOW I FIX THIS PROBLEM!! I WANNA SO MY OWN SERVER THX IF YOU HELP ME :rolleyes:[/quote]
lolz I dont know much about hamachi but what I can tell you is you shoudl try getting so you dont need it.
